Hard Delete Profile
Note:
  -ref
    -https://support.reltio.com/hc/en-us/articles/360028554211-What-is-the-meaning-of-a-soft-and-hard-deletes-in-Reltio
  -Profile is also called an entity. 
Main Success Scenario:
  1. "Hard Delete Profile by URI"
  2. xxx:fill in 
Alternatives:
  1a. Deleting a list of profiles, but not a large amount
    1a1. "Hard Delete Profile by URI list"
    1a2. go to step 2
  1b. Deleting a large number of profiles, but not all the profiles for an entity type
    1b1. "Hard Delete Profile with Bulk Process"
    1b2. go to step 2
  1c. Deleting all profile of a specific entity type
    1c1. "Hard Delete Profile by Entity Type"
    1c2. go to step 2
  1d. Deleting profiles due to GDPR
    1d1. "Hard Delete Profile by GDPR"
    1d2. go to step 2


Hard Delete Profile by URI
  -ref
    -https://docs.reltio.com/en/explore/get-going-with-apis-and-rocs-utilities/reltio-rest-apis/model-apis/entities-api/delete-entity
Main Success Scenario:
  1. xxx:fill in
